Name: There Won't be Light
About the game: There Won't be Light is a horror experience focused on the player's interaction with the environment. Through cooperation with other players, escape the scenario by solving the present puzzles, and don't let the monsters stop the ritual. Purge: In a singleplayer/co-op experience of up to 4 players, escape the scene while the one lurking in the shadows hunts you down. Tools: Your voice is your salvation and your damnation. While in silence, There Won't be Light will provide silent tools to communicate with other players. Use them creatively and wisely. Maps: Explore abandoned enviroments and be chased by different types of monsters!
